articles.title: CBI Raids On Manish Sisodia: Searches To Continue, Say Sources
articles.description: Manish Sisodia, Delhi's Deputy Chief Minister who also handles the Excise department, was raided by the CBI today over the Centre's allegations of corruption in the liquor policy. The Aam Aadmi Party government has denied the allegations.
